Author: alzaboschmilk
Text: Yeah I think so. The sweetness is my drug and I just want to keep the high going.  I have also noticed that drinking diet soda makes me more likely to binge later, even if I hadn’t been in a b/p cycle

Author: cummo22
Text: So you reckon the sweetness kicks in the binge urge ? I absolutely think this happens to me. I’ll feel full and satisfied after a meal but I find something sweet that I don’t even really want and my brain switches to binge mode
